title: Double it or Nothing
itunes:title: Double it or Nothing
description:
The Breakfast Club is back from vacation and they had a lot to talk about it, with one being about the Detroit concert that double charged white people for tickets! so we opened up the phone lines to see what our listeners thought about it. Also we had Bashir Salahuddin & Diallo Riddle stop by, where they spoke on new series 'South Side', writing comedy and staying humbled. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to the woman who decided to lick ice cream from a local freezer and then put it back.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
The Breakfast Club is back from vacation and they had a lot to talk about it, with one being about the Detroit concert that double charged white people for tickets! so we opened up the phone lines to see what our listeners thought about it.
